scripts.build: tsc && npm run compile:release && vite build
scripts.compile: npm run compile:go && npm run compile:typescript
scripts.compile:release: npm run compile:go:release && npm run compile:typescript
scripts.compile:go: cd go-wasm && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -gcflags 'all=-N -l' -o ../public/wasm/main.wasm main.go
scripts.compile:go:release: cd go-wasm && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm tinygo build -o ../public/wasm/main.wasm main.go
